description: Designed and launched an end-to-end inactive account processing pipeline to meet regulatory requirements, covering identification (Snowflake), merchant notification, automated closure, feature-flagged rollout, and monitoring.
Led a zero-downtime migration off a legacy onboarding service using shadow traffic and structured mismatch logging, enabling safe cutover and full deprecation of legacy dependencies.

Implemented Japan issuer installments end-to-end, unlocking a critical payment method for Japanese market expansion and increasing checkout conversion through installment pricing display across PDP/cart/order flow.

Contributed to checkout redesign for Square's hardware e-commerce platform serving multiple international markets, implementing modern React patterns, promo management, and responsive layouts across Rails + React stack.
Migrated application from in-house feature flag application to vendor application.
Added trade-in flow for sellers with deprecated devices contributing to the effort to ensure sellers had access to latest hardware and software.
Implemented new features to allow users to self-service and reduce support load. They include account reactivation and partial payments.
Part of the effort to update our billing application to accommodate new payment service providers.
Led effort to migrate transactional emails to 3rd party service and update them from plaintext to HTML localized layouts.
Updated our team's web applications to record analytics metrics.
Contributed to the company's effort to Dockerize our team's multi-faceted web applications and migrate them to the AWS cloud.
Developed internal APIs leveraged by both our web applications and our Viewer desktop application related to MFA.
Wrote document management system for document distribution to stores.
Designed and implemented media distribution application to enable Marketing to share social and printable media with partners.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs that were critical to customer-facing and internal business applications.
Developed scripts for the sanitation and import of data into company databases as well as the processes to monitor them.
Contributed to the planning and design of database schema to ensure normalized data with flexibility to grow.
Developed NOC monitoring dashboard and backend to support applications.
Wrote server scripts that integrated 3rd party services into central monitoring.
Designed system for report generation of team performance metrics.
Administered Jira company-wide and implemented departments' project requirements.
Remedied company-wide payment system outage by writing hotfix script deployed to 1000+ store servers in 500+ locations.
Wrote Windows application for Store Support team that partially automated ticket creation.
Exceeded customer service expectations based on customer service satisfaction surveys.
Lead the implementation of the new inventory management procedures.
Sole technician and responsible for computer and phone repair/diagnostic.
Maintained in-store computers (internet-cafe) and implemented own system management method to reduce maintenance requirement.
